name: Don't Stop This Drop
description:
Don't stop this Drop is a game for the #cyberpunkjam run by itch.io and @deviever.

Controls

  1. Arrow keys to move around
  2. Jump on to buildings and press Z, X, C when a window passes by in respective lane 1, 2 or 3. (Think Guitar Hero)
  3. Space bar to jump detach off of a building

Note

You're not aligned to the first building as you start, make sure to move down to snap to it and start hitting Z, X, C when a window passes by in the corresponding lane. :) Rooftops will kill you and you'll also die if the adrenaline multiplier becomes zero.

This is my first game ever so feedback is welcome! :)

Game: @Royn3D
Music: Android128 - Wargod
